title: After fully vaccinating a majority of its population, Israel no longer requires people to wear masks outdoors
content:
1. After fully vaccinating a majority of its population, Israel no longer requires people to wear masks outdoors  Yahoo News
  2. Outdoor mask-wearing no longer required in Israel? Vaccination in Israel | Latest COVID English News  WION
  3. Israel drops outdoor mask mandate with 80% of adults vaccinated  Fox News
  4. Masks come off as Israel vaunts virus victory  Manila Bulletin Online
  5. Israel signs deal to buy millions of COVID-19 vaccine doses from Pfizer, Netanyahu says  Reuters

localize.title: 国民の大部分にワクチンを完全に接種したイスラエルでは、屋外でのマスク着用が必要なくなりました。
在为大多数人口全面接种疫苗后，以色列不再要求人们在户外佩戴口罩。
在爲大多數人口全面接種疫苗後，以色列不再要求人們在戶外佩戴口罩。
